title: Four Horsemen of Meaning (Part 2)- Jordan Peterson, John Vervaeke, Bishop Barron, Jonathan Pageau
description:
This part 2 of my theological response to the recent conversation between @Jordan B Peterson @John Vervaeke @Bishop Robert Barron and @Jonathan Pageau .

Here is part 1:
https://youtu.be/aaOmcgN3_Sc

I've had a couple dialogues with John Vervaeke in the past year. You can check those out here:

Here's a video of my first conversation with John Vervaeke:
https://youtu.be/7xX7DWZjmFc

And a video of my second conversation with him:
https://youtu.be/RUWK1WJZH_w

If you are interested in my 3 part lecture series entitled "Jesus and John Vervaeke" on my podcast start here:

https://www.podbean.com/ew/pb-p9pth-10acee7
